v1.0.0 - 13 June, 2024
- Initial Release.
- Supported for Vlocity OmniStudio.
- Fetch and display OmniStudio Components (OmniScript, FlexCard, Integration Procedure, DataRaptor).

v1.1.0 - 14 June, 2024
- Minor bug fixes.

v.1.2.0 - 16 June, 2024
- Added support for both Standard as well as Vlocity OmniStudio.
- Ability to execute IP, DR with payload.
- UI enhancements.
- Bug fixes for Sandbox.
- Added Namespace logic.

v.1.2.2 - 20 June, 2024
- Added ability to find OmniStudio Components on active page (FlexCard, OmniScript)
- Optimized logic to find Namespace.
- Added Help Section, need to add more data.

Parking Lot: Things to think about
==================================
1. Distinguish between LWC & OmniScript LWC Comp.
